text: Ne mubandu beshitabu aliwo ulia nomuchelekha okhukhubishila omwandu abikha ne alakhukalusilia. Ne mubo aliwo ulia nomwelesia isende ndala shakhukalusilia tawe, halali nomwemeele okhumubanza. Kano nilwokhuba mbu baboola mbu; “khubula ukhufunania mubakorwa okhusooma bano” bachishilanga Nyasaye obubeyi nibamanyile
